It's Not Big, And It's Not Clever

Posted to Mottr.am by Jack on 31 August 2009. Tagged culture and web.

“It is sly, knowing and often downright nasty. Politicians and celebrities are its prey. And it attacks, under the guise of wit, without proof or reason. David Denby goes on the hunt for snark, which is invading all modern discourse from gossip sites to newspapers”. David Denby on snark.
